description:
They finally approach the final set of match and Hinata and Karasuno are fired up. However, since Seijoh are so tight as a team, they start to take the lead. At this rate, Seijoh will leave them in the dust. To change the flow of the game, the coach decides to...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ce qui va changer le cours du jeu
Ein Ball, der den Verlauf bestimmt
The Point That Changes the Momentum
